languages.text: "Я лишь присматриваю, Ваша Светлость. Смело обращайтесь к старине Найджу с любыми вопросами — он знает палаты плазмадвигателя как свои пять пальцев".
"I'm just keeping an eye out, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Feel free to ask old Nije any questions you may have — he knows the plasma drive chambers like the back of his hand."
languages.original_text: "Я лишь присматриваю, Ваша Светлость. Смело обращайтесь к старине Найджу с любыми вопросами — он знает палаты плазмадвигателя как свои пять пальцев".

traits.locale_text: "I'm just keeping an eye out, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Feel free to ask old Nije any questions you may have — he knows the plasma drive chambers like the back of his hand."
"Just ask me any question you like — I know this place like the back of my hand."
"I'm just keeping an eye out, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Feel free to ask old Nije any questions you may have — he knows the plasma drive chambers like the back of his hand."
"Just ask me any question you like — I know this place like the back of my hand."
"I'm just keeping an eye out, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Feel free to ask old Nije any questions you may have — he knows the plasma drive chambers like the back of his hand."
"I'm just keeping an eye out, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Feel free to ask old Nije any questions you may have — he knows the plasma drive chambers like the back of his hand."
"I'm just keeping an eye out, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Feel free to ask old Nije any questions you may have — he knows the plasma drive chambers like the back of his hand."
"I'm just keeping an eye out, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Feel free to ask old Nije any questions you may have — he knows the plasma drive chambers like the back of his hand."

languages.text: «Solo estoy vigilando al personal, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Pregunte al viejo Nije lo que quiera; se conoce las cámaras del motor de plasma como la palma de su mano».
languages.original_text: "I'm just keeping an eye out, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Feel free to ask old Nije any questions you may have — he knows the plasma drive chambers like the back of his hand."

traits.locale_text: «Solo estoy vigilando al personal, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Pregunte al viejo Nije lo que quiera; se conoce las cámaras del motor de plasma como la palma de su mano».

languages.text: 「私はただ見張っているだけですよ、陛下。何かご質問があれば、ニジェの爺さんに聞いてください。あの人はプラズマ ドライブ室のことなら隅々まで知っています」
languages.original_text: "I'm just keeping an eye out, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Feel free to ask old Nije any questions you may have — he knows the plasma drive chambers like the back of his hand."

traits.locale_text: 「私はただ見張っているだけですよ、陛下。何かご質問があれば、ニジェの爺さんに聞いてください。あの人はプラズマ ドライブ室のことなら隅々まで知っています」

languages.text: “这个地方我只是偶尔会留意几眼，大人。如果您有什么问题的话，尽管问老尼杰，他对等离子驱动室了如指掌。”
languages.original_text: "I'm just keeping an eye out, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Feel free to ask old Nije any questions you may have — he knows the plasma drive chambers like the back of his hand."

traits.locale_text: “这个地方我只是偶尔会留意几眼，大人。如果您有什么问题的话，尽管问老尼杰，他对等离子驱动室了如指掌。”

languages.text: "Ich halte nur die Augen offen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Tut Euch keinen Zwang an, fragt den alten Nije, was Ihr wissen wollt ... er kennt die Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern wie seine Westentasche.
languages.original_text: "I'm just keeping an eye out, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Feel free to ask old Nije any questions you may have — he knows the plasma drive chambers like the back of his hand."

traits.locale_text: "Ich halte nur die Augen offen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Tut Euch keinen Zwang an, fragt den alten Nije, was Ihr wissen wollt ... er kennt die Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern wie seine Westentasche.

languages.text: « Je me contente de veiller au grain, Votre Seigneurie. Si vous avez des questions, ce bon vieux Nije est l'homme de la situation. Il connaît les salles des réacteurs à plasma comme sa poche. »
languages.original_text: "I'm just keeping an eye out, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Feel free to ask old Nije any questions you may have — he knows the plasma drive chambers like the back of his hand."

traits.locale_text: « Je me contente de veiller au grain, Votre Seigneurie. Si vous avez des questions, ce bon vieux Nije est l'homme de la situation. Il connaît les salles des réacteurs à plasma comme sa poche. »

languages.text: "Yalnızca gözümü açık tutuyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Sorularınız varsa onları ihtiyar Nije'ye çekinmeden sorabilirsiniz. Plazma iticisi odalarını avcunun içi gibi bilir."
languages.original_text: "I'm just keeping an eye out, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Feel free to ask old Nije any questions you may have — he knows the plasma drive chambers like the back of his hand."
